name: Alum's Strata Gems
description:
This is a Touhou Project fangame made in a few days for the Touhou Station Jam.

Help Parsee win cards by matching gems with opponent's cards. Be careful- you have to risk your own cards to win more. Take all cards from the final boss to win.

Left Click - Interact
Right Click - Cancel
Escape - Pause Menu
F11 - Full Screen
F10 - Change Window Size

Wildcard - This special gem can match as any gem type.

Take - This item allows moving a gem or swapping two gems!

Free Move - Click this then any other item to move without using up your turn.
